text:
e="preserve">Jean Panisse (March 17, 1928 – January 1, 2021) was a French actor. His career began in 1952 and he retired in 2004. Panisse was born in Marseille, France. He was known for his roles in "An Angel on Wheels", "The Young Wolves" and "Perched on a Tree".
Panisse died on 1 January 2021 in Marseille from COVID-19 at the age of 92.
